document_data.name: Elvish
document_data.mainbody:
'''Elven''' (commonly called '''Elvish''' and sometimes referred to as the '''True Tongue''') was the language (or language family) of the ''[[Tel-quessir|Tel'Quessir]]'' (''e.g.'', [[eladrin]], [[elves]], and [[drow]]). Its script was known as [[Espruar]].
{{TOC limit|3}}

Dialects.Grodd: A dialect spoken exclusively by [[grodd goblin]]s. This dialect was a corrupted form of Ancient Elvish, derived from an extensive period of servitude to the elven [[wizard]] [[Nalavarauthatoryl]].<ref> This dialect was roughly 50% comprehensible to those fluent in contemporary Elvish, allowing for the general gist of meanings to be conveyed.<ref>
Dialects.Wild Elvish: This dialect, spoken by [[sylvan elves]], was highly musical. It sounded strange to other elves, but could be understood by them with some difficulty.
